title: Torrent Power gets letter of award to supply 150 MW renewable energy
description: Torrent Power awarded 150MW wind solar hybrid project by Distribution Unit with Rs 1,825 crore investment at Rs 3.65 per kWh, under a 25-year PPA, planning 245 MW capacity installation.
